Detailed Description

This structure holds a python callback to be called when the filter's time reaches that specified.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AvatarFilter::Callback::Callback ( double  time,
PyObjectPtr  function,
bool  passMB 
)

Construtor.

Parameters:
time The time in the filter's playback that the python function should be called.
function The python object that will be called when the specified time is reached.
passMB True if the callback function wishes to receive the difference between the call time and the call time requested as a parameter.

Member Function Documentation

bool AvatarFilter::Callback::operator< ( const Callback &  b  )  const

This implements the less-than operator for the callback, comparing one time stamp against another.

Returns:
Returns true if timestamp of this callback is less than that of the callback given.
